supportTools.mainTab.description: Suite of tools used by support team to help triage and resolve select learner issues.
supportTools.accountActions.cancelRetire: This will cancel retirement for the requested user. Do you wish to proceed?
supportTools.accountActions.resetPasswor: We will send a message with password recovery instructions to the email address {email}. Do you wish to proceed?
supportTools.accountActions.retireUser:
You are about to retire {username} with the email address: {email}.{br}{br}
              This is a serious action that will revoke this user's access to edX and
              their earned certificates. Furthermore, the email address associated
              with the retired account will not be able to be used to create a new account.
record.table.header.course.name: Course Name
no.public.record.link: There is no public instance for this record. Learners must create a public link on their own.
